description: Coordinator requests a follow‑up reminder for patients who have not responded within 7 days; the assistant queries the EMR for those patients, drafts a reminder message, sends it securely to each patient, and returns a summary of the actions taken.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. Your job is to parse eligibility criteria, query the EMR, draft secure portal messages, capture consent, and schedule meetings while keeping full audit logs.
Please draft a follow‑up reminder for patients who have not responded within 7 days and send it to them via the secure patient portal.
I will first locate patients who were contacted more than 7 days ago but have not yet given consent. Then I will draft a polite reminder and deliver it through the secure portal.

arguments.subject: Reminder: Clinical Trial Opportunity – Please Respond
